Hey, I am Vaibhav Ahuja, currently working as a SWE at United Health Group, GGN. I graduated in 2019 with a bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering from Delhi Technological University. I am interested in Mathematics, and like solving algorithmic problems. This blog is to document my learnings, ideas, projects, and about any stuff that excites me.
